net.nicholaswilliams.java.licensing.encryption

Class FilePrivateKeyDataProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.nicholaswilliams.java.licensing.encryption.FilePrivateKeyDataProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrivateKeyDataProvider

    public class FilePrivateKeyDataProvider
extends Object
implements PrivateKeyDataProvider
    A default implementation of PrivateKeyDataProvider that reads the private key from a file.

    This provider is immutable. Once created, the file that the private key is located at cannot be changed.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Nick Williams

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FilePrivateKeyDataProvider(File privateKeyFile)
      Create a new provider, specifying the file from which the private key can be read.
      FilePrivateKeyDataProvider(String privateKeyFileName)
      Create a new provider, specifying the name of the file from which the private key can be read.

      This method returns the data from the file containing the encrypted private key from the public/private key pair.

    • Method Detail

      • getEncryptedPrivateKeyData

        public byte[] getEncryptedPrivateKeyData()
                                  throws KeyNotFoundException
        This method returns the data from the file containing the encrypted private key from the public/private key pair. The contract for this method can be fulfilled by storing the data in a byte array literal in the source code itself.

        It is imperative that you obfuscate the bytecode for the implementation of this class. It is also imperative that the byte array exist only for the life of this method (i.e., DO NOT store it as an instance or class field).
        Specified by:
        getEncryptedPrivateKeyData in interface PrivateKeyDataProvider
        Returns:
        the encrypted file contents from the private key file.
        Throws:
        KeyNotFoundException - if the key data could not be retrieved; an acceptable message or chained cause must be provided.

      • getPrivateKeyFile

        public File getPrivateKeyFile()
        Gets the file that the private key is located at.
        Returns:
        the file.
